      • $qmark

        public <U> scala.concurrent.Future<U> $qmark(scala.Function1<ActorRef<U>,A> f,
                                             Timeout timeout,
                                             Scheduler scheduler)
        Allows to "ask" the EntityRef for a reply. See AskPattern for a complete write-up of this pattern

        Example usage: 

        
 case class Request(msg: String, replyTo: ActorRef[Reply])
 case class Reply(msg: String)

 implicit val timeout = Timeout(3.seconds)
 val target: EntityRef[Request] = ...
 val f: Future[Reply] = target ? (Request("hello", _))

        Please note that an implicit Timeout and Scheduler must be available to use this pattern.

        Parameters:
        f - (undocumented)
        timeout - (undocumented)
        scheduler - (undocumented)
        Returns:
        (undocumented)
